summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3699 , for the improvement of West Frontenac Street, from California Avenue to 47th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45516 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
